tool_description:
Get statistical data for the major global indices (N225 SP500 DJI FTSE100 DAX CAC40 STOXX50 ASX200 IBEX35 HSI
TSX BVSP)
name: Global Market Indices Data
title: Global Market Indices Data

api_list.name: index_last_price
index_top5_constituents
api_list.description: Get top 5 gainers/losers of an index  over a period

api_list.name: index_historic_price
api_list.description: Get historic daily price of an index over a period

api_list.name: indices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-market-indices-data.p.rapidapi.com/v1/indices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-market-indices-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-market-indices-data.p.rapidapi.com/v1/indices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-market-indices-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: index_constituents
index_price_change
api_list.description: Get an Index change over the period of time(1DAY, 7DAYS, 1MONTH, 3MONTHS, 6MONTHS, 1YEAR )
